msg: GERONIMO-1607 - Allow arguments to the Windows START command to be specified in an environment variable GERONIMO_WIN_START_ARGS (merged from trunk).

author: jsisson
msg: GERONIMO-1604 - Make scripts consistent in the output of environment variable information (previously deploy.bat and deploy.sh did not output this information).  Also allow environment variable information to be turned off using the new GERONIMO_ENV_INFO environment variable. (merged from trunk)
